title: McCormick Culinary Italian Seasoning, 6.25 oz - One 6.25 Ounce Container of Italian Seasoning Blend for Mediterranean Cuisine, Perfect for Pasta Sauces, Meatballs, Pizza, Soups, Chicken and More
features: VIBRANT FLAVOR: McCormick Culinary Italian Seasoning brings a savory and sweet flavor profile to your menu, allowing you to easily create all kinds of Italian cuisine
HIGH QUALITY HERBS: Features an aromatic blend of premium herbs, like rosemary, marjoram and thyme to create a signature taste
MADE FOR CHEFS: Contains 6.5 ounces of Italian spice per container, making this product perfect to have on hand for back-of-house use in your professional kitchen
VERSATILE BLEND: Adds an earthy base and an aromatic, flowery tone to dishes ranging from meatballs and pizza to mashed potatoes and chicken.
FEEL GOOD INGREDIENTS: Kosher and made without added MSG for a classic taste you'll feel good about serving to your customers, regardless of their dietary needs
description: Experience a savory, sweet flavor profile with McCormick Culinary Italian Seasoning. Count on this blend to deliver purity, consistency and quality in the kitchen. With its combination of earthy, aromatic ingredients, this seasoning will add plenty of character to all kinds of cuisine. Sprinkle some on garlic bread or meat and create irresistible dishes in no time. A blend of premium herbs comprises this savory seasoning. Inside each bottle of Italian seasoning spice, find a perfectly balanced mixture of marjoram, thyme, rosemary, savory, sage, oregano and basil. The finished result is a seasoning that will bring a pleasant taste and aroma to appetizers, side dishes and main courses. Made with culinary professionals in mind, this 6.25-ounce container of Italian herbs makes it easier than ever to add a traditional taste to your menu. Whether you use it for your signature back-of-house creations or for customizing new dishes, this container will be a valued addition to your spice cabinet. Having bulk Italian seasoning on hand means you'll always be ready to craft authentic cuisine. Use it to add flavor and fragrance to Italian favorites like prosciutto stuffed pork, caprese salad, lasagna, Tuscan chicken breast and pizza. Its versatile and relatively mild flavor profile pairs well with everything from roasted vegetables to pasta and garlic bread. You can even mix some into oil and vinegar to create a delicious salad dressing. The options are truly endless! You'll find yourself reaching for this pantry staple time and time again. This Italian seasoning offers more than its robust flavor profile. As a kosher blend with no MSG, Italian seasoning is a healthy addition for texture and aroma that meets your guests' dietary needs.
